channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: How to use tax planning strategies for maximum savings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Learn how to navigate tax laws and regulations for optimal financial management.

item.title: Report: China to tighten rules around releasing generative AI tools
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Sources close to Chinese officials say the draft rules for AI developers have been updated to include acquiring a license before releasing generative AI systems.

item.title: How to actually spend your Bitcoin, Explained
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Learn how to spend Bitcoin by directly paying merchants or using Bitcoin debit cards, as well as utilizing peer-to-peer platforms for transactions with other individuals.

item.title: Crypto custody market reached $448 billion in 2022: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Researchers cite a rise of interest in crypto staking and nonfungible tokens as the major developments for the custody market.

item.title: Bitcoin ‘Burj Khalifa’ fakeout repeats as BTC price spikes to $31K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price gets a $31,000 boost, but like last week, Bitcoin bulls fail to hold it; is this classic “re-accumulation?”

item.title: DeFi borrower uses luxury watch-backed NFT as collateral for a loan
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: While some praised the move, others believed it was centralized and added NFTs where it was unnecessary.

item.title: UK FCA shuts down 26 crypto ATMs following coordinated investigation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The FCA and other law enforcement agencies investigated 36 crypto ATM locations using powers under money laundering regulations.

item.title: SEC is ‘wrongfully attempting’ to police crypto markets — Paradigm counsel
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Rodrigo Seira has blasted the SEC for overstepping its jurisdiction in its case against crypto exchange Bittrex.

item.title: Multichain’s ‘mysterious withdrawals’ have whiffs of a ‘rug pull’ — Chainalysis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Chainalysis told Cointelegraph that it was “describing it as a possible rug pull” based on an analysis of Multichain’s spurious transactions and internal problems.

item.title: Brazil’s CBDC pilot contains code that can freeze or reduce funds, dev claims
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Pedro Magalhães, a blockchain developer who claims to have reverse-engineered Brazil’s pilot CBDC has found code that would allow accounts to be frozen or drained at will.

item.title: Dubai crypto regulator suspends BitOasis crypto exchange license
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: BitOasis was the first crypto exchange to get an operating license in Dubai, which the local regulator has now suspended for not meeting key conditions in time.

item.title: Bitcoin halving bullish for Saylor’s MicroStrategy: Berenberg Capital
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Analysts predict that Bitcoin’s next pre-halving rally could begin in the next four months.

item.title: Pink, Pussy, Venom, Inferno — Drainers coming for a crypto wallet near you
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Crypto wallet drainers, or sweepers, are malicious smart contracts that can quickly empty a crypto wallet of its funds and are a standard tool for phishing scammers.

item.title: China expands CBDC’s tentacles, Malaysia is HK’s new crypto rival: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: China’s president Xi Jinping expands CBDC cooperation at SCO, Hong Kong’s crypto licensing costs surge, and Multichain is hacked yet again.

item.title: Bitcoin has entered a civil war — Over ‘art’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Lugui Tillier
item.description: The Ordinals Protocol is generating a circular digital economy where assets are priced, bought and sold via Bitcoin.

item.title: Arkham on-chain ‘Intel Exchange’ labeled ‘snitch-to-earn’ by Crypto Twitter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Users who shared links to a waitlist for the Arkham service had their email addresses exposed on Twitter due to how the references were encoded.

item.title: BOE governor trashes crypto, stablecoins in favor of ‘enhanced digital money’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: A retail CBDC or “enhanced” digital money would support the singleness of money and settlement finality, Andrew Bailey said, but crypto isn’t money.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Arcadia Finance hacker used reentrancy exploit, team demands return of funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: In a post-mortem report, Arcadia Finance developers said an attacker stole funds by liquidating a vault before it could perform a health check, interrupting the app’s normal flow of operations.

item.title: US lawmakers allege CCP connection in calling for SEC, DOJ investigation of Prometheum
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Republican members of Congress stepped up their allegations of Prometheum’s ties to the Chinese Community Party, claiming potentially false or misleading statements to the SEC.

item.title: From Thailand to South Africa, regulators tighten their grip on crypto: Law Decoded, July 3–10
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: South Africa’s financial regulator has announced that all crypto exchanges in the country must obtain licenses by the end of 2023.

item.title: Connext founder proposes ‘Sovereign Bridged Token’ standard after Multichain incident
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: EIP-7281 will allow token issuers to list official bridges and limit the rate at which they can mint tokens, potentially limiting losses from bridge hacks.

item.title: Parliamentary report recommends Canada recognize, strategize about blockchain industry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.category: A report released by the Canadian House of Commons Standing Committee on Industry and Technology recommends the country take steps to encourage the blockchain industry.
item.description: “Canada punches above its weight” in blockchain innovation, parliamentarians conclude, but lots more should be done to encourage the industry.

item.title: A no-fail trade? Bitcoin traders who dollar-cost average are profitable
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Nibley
item.description: Investors who have dollar-cost averaged into Bitcoin over time are profitable regardless of when they began implementing the strategy.

item.title: Social media discussions play a crucial role in influencing crypto returns: Study
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The researchers also determined that “news sentiment” is a much less effective predictor of cryptocurrency returns.

item.title: How to use third-party ChatGPT plugins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elizabeth Gail
item.description: ChatGPT currently supports third-party plugins with different functionalities that augment ChatGPT’s utility.

item.title: Price analysis 7/10: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The weakness in the U.S. Dollar Index bodes well for Bitcoin and altcoins in the near term.

item.title: Grayscale lawyers refer to SEC allowing Volatility Shares’ investment vehicle in push for ETF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Grayscale, the Volatility Shares ETF was an “even riskier” product than Bitcoin futures ETFs, suggesting the SEC should allow its spot crypto ETF to begin trading.

item.title: Gaming gear maker Razer hacked, user data, encryption keys for sale online: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Singapore-U.S. gaming company has responded to reports of 404,000 emails, keys, logins and other info for sale; it hasn’t finished dealing with a 2020 leak yet.

item.title: How to use ChatGPT for project management
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover how to leverage the power of ChatGPT for effective project management.
